messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] [ASK] Samurai Sword Type (as seen on picture attached)
messages.msgSnippet: Stephen, I m not sure what it is you are really asking.  Surely the answers to both your questions were apparent when you acquired the swords. Firstly, a
messages.messageBody:
Stephen,

I'm not sure what it is you are really asking. Surely the answers to both your questions were apparent when you acquired the swords.

Firstly, a caveat: The picture isn't clear enough or detailed enough to tell much. Having said that, my impression is that they are modern reproductions. Cost?? Not much compared to real swords.

Barry Thomas
Australia.


----- Original Message -----
From: stephen_halim
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, January 25, 2009 7:47 PM
Subject: [nihontostudy] [ASK] Samurai Sword Type (as seen on picture attached)


Dear all,

I'm a new member here.
I want to ask about Samurai Sword i got here as pictured below.
It's originally from Japan.

URL link: http://img104.imageshack.us/my.php?image=samuraiaa7.jpg

Questions:
1. What type of Samurai is this?
2. How much doest it cost?

Thank you.

.

Dear Stephen,
this is no joke???
Do you know Lord of the Rings? Big Trolls?
Here (Germany)we call in some forums people, who challenge the forum
with questions. Any Forum, of course.
HAve fun with your swords....
Eck
